dhamadhamāyati：[dhamati 的 intens.] 吹了又吹，反復地吹（to blow frequently and incessantly）.
dhamadhamāyati：[dhamati の intens.] 吹きに吹く.

dhamadhamāyati：dhamadhamāyati（kri）
ဓမဓမာယတိ（ကြိ）
[dhamadhama+āya+ti]
[ဓမဓမ+အာယ+တိ]
Dhamadhamāyati，[cp．Sk．dadhmāti，Intens．to dhamati] to blow frequently，strongly or incessantly Miln.117．（Page 335）

dhamadhamāyati：ဓမဓမာယတိ（ကြိ）
[ဓမဓမ+အာယ+တိ]
ဓမ်း，ဓမ်း-ဓုမ်း，ဓုမ်း-ဟုန်း，ဟုန်း-ဟု-အသံပြု၏-မြည်ဟီး၏။

dhamadhamāyati：ဓမဓမာယတိ
ထပ်တလဲလဲ မှုတ်၏။
